comment: really sweet professor and accessible whenever outside of class!!

I had an amazing time having Dr. Mercer as my teacher this semester. She is very kind and understanding! I had rough schedule to work with and Dr. Mercer was more than happy to work work with me! She is caring and always makes her self available to all of her students

She gives out a lot of extra credit grades too!

Prof. Mercer is one of the best professors I've ever had. I don't really have an interest in bio, but her passion and energy just radiates through the room, and I can honestly say that I enjoyed taking this class. She gives out a lot of extra credit which can help TREMENDOUSLY. I got decent grades on tests, but the extra credit was super helpful!

She is an angel sent from heaven. I love her so much. She treats all her students like her kids. She is smart and caring and she will set you up for success. Just make sure to do the work and show her that you're putting in the time that this course requires.

She was the best professor I had at Kennesaw State. She was very caring and always willing to help. She made the classroom very open and a safe space for everyone to share their opinion about genetics. We had a final essay about the topic of our choice instead of a final. Tests don't weigh as much as everything else in the class. Very easy and fun!

I took Bio 1107 with Dr. Mercer during my first semester here at KSU. To say the least, she is amazing! She knows what she is talking about and is excited to teach; she is a nerd at heart and I love that. She is caring for her students and her TA's. She is understanding and sweet.
You will need to do your homework though :)

GREAT PROF!!! i took her for lecture & lab. I did wind up having a TA for the lab though. she takes the time to make sure you understand the material and really knows her stuff. her tests arent too terrible but if you dont do good their are several extra credit things. has a daily class attendance sheet.

She's so sweet and really takes the time to get to know you if you speak to her. She lectures well. She assigns a lot of homework but it can be done within an afternoon. She drops the lowest quiz and test as well as other assignments.
She is a great teacher and drops the lowest test and quiz grade. However, she has lots of homework every week.

She is an amazing professor. I was struggling with Biology in the beginning of the semester badly (two Cs on the first test). Went to her office hours discussed new studying techniques and ended up getting's As on the rest of the test because of her advice. She genuinely cares about her students and wants you to succeed. TAKE HER!

- Lecture is very important
- slides are just as in lecture she just goes more in-depth with information. 
- I recommend reading chapter or going over slides before class to be able to. correlate content from lecture. 
- provides extra credit + weekly quizzes over chapters + breakout sessions grades that benefit your grade in a positive way

I would recommend her to everyone. You can tell that she genuinely cares about her students and her lectures are great and entertaining. She gives so many extra credit opportunities as well. All tests and quizzes are online with a lockdown browser. The only mandatory attendance are the breakout sessions. Overall great professor.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback--Lots of homework

comment: Professor Mercer was amazing! She is super sweet and caring towards her students. She makes the lectures very engaging and entertaining. Every week there is homework, a quiz, and a breakout session. Additionally, she drops the lowest quiz and test grades. Her tests are easy and cover the content in the lecture slides. Overall, great professor!
Very sweet. Helps others with respect and clear in her work.

Dr. Mercer is a very kind professor and truly cares about her students. She's a fantastic professor and makes lectures and labs engaging and interesting for everyone. Very welcoming and accessible for help.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework--Caring

comment: Dr.Mercer was amazing! I won't lie her tests are difficult but she drops your lowest one. There is homework and a quiz due every Sunday which took maybe an hour to do both. All tests and quizzes were online with a lockdown browser and webcam. She gives 3 extra credit opportunities and extra credit on every homework assignment. Take her for BIO1107!

I had her for the lab and i honestly really liked her.  She does a lecture for like the first 15-20 minutes and then you get straight to the lab. We had lab worksheets every week but i usually finished  before class ended. We also had posters which you do with your group so it was not terrible.  She would answer all your questions
Great teacher with great lectures, moves a little bit fast but posts all the slides and information on D2L, homework is easy but tests are a little bit difficult, altogether a great teacher.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Amazing lectures --Lecture heavy

comment: I love Dr. Mercer. She explains everything very well and makes an easy class even easier. There is weekly pearson homework and quizzes, but it is all online and very simple, with two attempts for quizzes and extra credit with every homework. All tests are online, and required to be done over the weekend, which is a little annoying but worth it.

She makes 2 hours of torture a lot more tolerable especially when class ends in the evening. I HATED Lab because of the work but that's out of her control because it's just the course load. She definitely loves her job and comes to class like she wants to be there, and it makes a huge difference. Expect lots of microscopes, it killed me inside
rating_tags: Group projects--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: I love Dr. Mercer. I took her twice because she's awesome. She makes sure her students understand the material and provides examples as well. Literally just attend class and you'll get an Easy A. She also has many extra credit opportunities. She responds to emails fast too.
Lots of material crammed into lectures, but that's out of her control and she does a great job covering everything. If you do the work and put in some effort for the tests, it's an easy A.

I never did any of Dr. Mercer's extra credit assignments, but I still ended with 100% in the class. I do know that she has a few extra credit assignments and the homework has extra credit too. I needed to miss an exam because I was out of town and she just told me to come in the next week to make it up. She is extremely caring and understanding.

She does a great job of testing us on exactly what she discusses in lectures. Everything is discussed in detail and she takes time to make sure everyone understands each subject. There are also a lot of extra credit chances.

Professor Mercer is so nice and explains content extremely well. Class is point based out of 1000. I took this class as an elective and she makes it feel like an elective class. She offers so much extra credit, you basically only have to make B's on her tests to still get an A in her class. Has 6 tests and drops the lowest one. Cumulative final.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: Prof. Mercer is great. Wish I could have had her for the Biology lecture too. She simplifies the labs and explains exactly how to do them. She is very laid-back and does not grade super strictly. Overall, it was an awesome experience.

Dr. Mercer is a super sweet professor who cares a lot about her students. She makes the class pretty easy but you need to come to class and understand the material because tests are all open-ended closed-notes. The assignments are easy and Dr. Mercer is pretty lenient with grading. Overall, I highly recommend her.

This a great professor who will do her best to see you succeed. Do not be afraid to ask for extensions or makeup she will be there for you. Class is simple just be on top of your work. Quizzes are online and tests are 40 questions in person but easy to pass if you do the study guide. Lots of extra credit opportunity.  Take Dr. Mercer if you can

TAKE HER CLASS! She genuinely cares about her students and her lectures are really helpful on tests and bonus questions. She dedicates her time after class to answer questions, and she understands what students struggle with. Attendence is mandatory in my experience, she does learning catalytics to keep tabs and you get points for being present.
Dr. Mercer is a great professor, always willing to help, a quiz every week and test are pretty straightforward.

Such a sweet lady, you can tell she loves what she does. She takes feedback from students and tries her best to answer any and all questions. Biology was a scary subject to me before her class, favorite professor yet!
shes very nice. i was missing work and she emailed me about it. i believe attendance is extra credit based.

YALL NEED TO TAKE HER. She is very passionate about what she does and it shows. She gives extra credit, will help you with any questions you have, and shes very sweet. She does have a quiz every week but if you just review the slideshows youll be fine (and you can take the quiz twice). 10/10 best professor.
Dr. Mercer is the sweetest and most caring professor I've ever had. She's very flexible and goes out of her way to get to know each of her students. 11/10 would recommend for everyone
Professor Mercer is honestly my favourite professor. She is very caring and understanding about everything. Take her!

Dr. Mercer is a wonderful professor, she is very caring of her students. She gives out a lot of extra credit and is easily reachable outside of class. While attendance is mandatory she is also understanding of reasons to miss class. She is very interactive with her class and is willing to help any student who has any questions. 100% recommend it!!!

I actually had her for culture of science and math and she was awesome. No tests. And stupid easy assignments. she was funny and witty. Lots of speakers come talk to this class and she extends a lot of assignments and not a harsh grader. only downside is if you miss 3 classes then you're dropped a letter if you miss 5 you fail.

Dr. Mercer is a great person and an even better professor, I struggled with the subject and she supported me from the very beginning.I passed a class I otherwise would have failed without her support. Attendance is mandatory because that's the best way to learn the material and she wants you to do well.Take this class if you struggle with biology.

Dr. Mercer was the sweetest professor i've met thus far. Emailed her about not being able to turn in an assignment on time, and she extended the due date for everyone. Tests are about 40-45 qs that come from her lecture and the quizzes she gives. Gives 10-question quizzes in class to see if you're grasping the material which are 2 tries.

Take this class!!! I never made above a C on any test, as they are extremely difficult, and still got an A in the class. Extra credit will help you out tremendously, and it's super easy. She makes you do a worksheet every class and turn it in for participation, but you get to work with a group! Definitely take this class!!!

Take her, take her, take her!!!! I LOVE Dr. Mercer! One of the most effortless classes I had all semester!! She is funny, caring, and wants to see her students succeed. Tests are basically on Powerpoint lectures, and she gives bonus questions for extra points. She provides extra credit opportunities so it can boost your grade!
quizes seem to be harder than the tests but she is willing to work with you to help you understand the material.

Dr. Mercer is a joy to have for lab. She was caring and patient with all her students. I recommend going to her during office hours if you are ever struggling, she is a lot of help. Her only flaw is that she can be a harsh grader.

Bio 1107 is a difficult course that covers a lot of material but Dr. Mercer works hard to get you through it. She's extremely nice and gives a lot of extra credit opportunities. You can tell she wants you to do well. The tests are hard, so plan to put in some extra work preparing for those. Highly recommend.

Dr. Mercer has been the best lab professor I have had. She is clear on what she expects from her students and is very forgiving. Put in effort and show that you care and she will give you the grade you deserve/want.

Dr. Mercer is easily the best professor for Biology at KSU. Not only is she caring but she also provides all materials needed to pass all of her quizzes and tests. Do expect to read and do expect to have to study for some exams. She gives well over 100 points in extra credit for homework and exams. She is a 10/10.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Dr. Mercer is an amazing person and an amazing professor. She was extremely understanding and caring. She will work with you if you are struggling and she will offer extra credit assignments. The course is lecture heavy, but she is open to answering questions and having conversations about various topics. Don't be afraid to talk to her!

She's an amazing teacher. She's extremely caring and made this tough course fun. This class is very test heavy. The final is impossible to pass without studying so study and put in the work and you'll be very successful in this course.

Dr Mercer was extremely supportive and understanding with her students. I was a dual enrollment student and she made sure that we were always good and understood assignments. She is very test heavy and the tests are lockdown browser with webcam. If you study a bit in advanced and pay attention during lectures, you'll be fine. Overall amazing !

I am so grateful I had her for this class. Sure you have to dedicate a lot of time reading the textbook for the quizzes/test but only a final project toward the end of the semester. Up to 5 points extra credit with monthly extra credit. Droppest lowest quiz & test which is such a blessing. Attendance mandatory (15%). She's a saint so pls take her.
Dr. Mercer is a great college teacher. The quizzes can be difficult but only if you don't put in the work. I love how she connects what we are learning with examples in the real world.

Dr. Mercer is the best biology teacher I have ever had. I used to dread going to bio class but now I am excited. She makes class interesting and fun with her bio memes and activities. You do have to put in the work to study the information but the extra credit opportunities are amazing. She is very inspiring and makes me motivated to learn.

She is an amazing person and you can truly tell she cares. If you want to do well, the textbook and the extra credit will be your best friend bc the quizzes/tests can be difficult if you don't dedicate time. Make sure to attend class bc those are easy points you'll miss out on. She wants you to pass, you just have to put in the effort.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Dr. Mercer is a nice person, but not suited for college teaching. She gives tests that have heavy spelling errors, confusing answer options, and it is EXTREMELY hard to pass her quizzes (which most are worth 50 points each, all respondus with webcam). She is extremely strict with attendance. This is supposed to be an intro-level bio class.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Test heavy--Tough grader

comment: The class is hard but she wants everyone to pass. She s really good about helping but you have to ask.

I have a friend taking Bio Chemistry at UGA and got help from him during this class. This is not treated like an intro class, its more Bio Chemistry than anything and way harder than it needs to be. Everything is reliant on the Pearson textbook. Dr. Mercer is a nice woman but definitely needs to work on simplifying the very tough topics she teaches
